12   | 
13   | #define CMD_SUCCESS 0
14   | #define CMD_UNKNOWN -1
15   | 
16   | char *get_cmd(RINGBUF *buf); 	/*+ Retrieve command from ring buffer +*/
17   | 
18   | int exec_cmd(char *cmd);		/*+ Execute a command +*/
19   |  
20   | void disp_prompt(void);			/*+ Display > prompt +*/
21   | 
22   | #endif
